sentences.english: Bt the same time, there has been a "regrettable" slowing of reforms inside Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 同時土耳其內部鼎新也“使人缺憾地”放緩了。

sentences.english: The only drawback is they can only be worn with pants.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的缺憾是他們只能搭配長褲穿。

sentences.english: Did the problem reveal some lack of skill on your part?
sentences.chinese: 這個問題顯示了你在技能方面的哪些缺憾？

sentences.english: The beautiful autumn made up for the wet summer.
sentences.chinese: 美麗的秋季抵消了多雨的夏季這一缺憾。

sentences.english: The children havent been fondled enough will still long for it when they grow up.
sentences.chinese: 沒有得到充足撫摸的孩子在長大後是有缺憾的。

sentences.english: The defect-free life, how do you deal with this?
sentences.chinese: 人生不可免的缺憾，你怎樣面對呢？

sentences.english: To learn in the olds' university can complement something lost when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 現在到老年大學讀書可以彌補我年輕時候的缺憾。

sentences.english: Life, always with incomplete beauty, because the imperfections and poignance.
sentences.chinese: 人生，總是帶着殘缺的美，因缺憾而悽美。

sentences.english: Perhaps the only shortcoming from Luis Figo 's injury.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的缺憾或許來自菲戈的因傷缺陣。

sentences.english: I'm deeply sory for your uncle's detoh.
sentences.chinese: 爲你叔叔的亡故我深表缺憾。

sentences.english: This is indeed a quite regrettprepared thing.
sentences.chinese: 這真是一件發令人缺憾的事變。

sentences.english: Happiness makes up in height for what it lacks in length.
sentences.chinese: 快樂幸福彌補孒其他的缺憾。

sentences.english: It is a pity that you missed the party.
sentences.chinese: 你未能參預聚會，真是缺憾。

sentences.english: This willingness to live and die in society is a mark of great deficiency .
sentences.chinese: 凡人帶着這樣的意願活着與死去纔是一種巨大的缺憾。

sentences.english: Love face, do not compromise, is a regret in life.
sentences.chinese: 愛面子，不妥協，是人生一個缺憾。

sentences.english: Wall paper and carpeting, no matter how luxurious, just cannot make up for a lack of windows!
sentences.chinese: 無論牆紙地毯有多奢華也無法彌補沒有窗子的缺憾。

definition: to complement/to make up for a deficiency
a faulty stroke in calligraphy or painting/a faulty expression in writing
lit. a blemish does not obscure jade's luster/the pros outweigh the cons (idiom)
perfect and without blemish/flawless/to leave nothing to be desired
